mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANSWERBOARD (SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REFER, STEP, DEPTH, DELFLAG, REGDATE) VALUES(ANSWERBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title}, #{content} , (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM ANSWERBOARD a),0, 0, 'N', SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE ANSWERBOARD SET CONTENT = #{content} WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, LPAD(' ', "DEPTH"*10) || TITLE, CONTENT, REFER, STEP, DEPTH, DELFLAG, REGDATE FROM ANSWERBOARD a WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
SELECT SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REFER, STEP, DEPTH, DELFLAG, REGDATE FROM ANSWERBOARD a ORDER BY REFER DESC , STEP
mapper.update: UPDATE ANSWERBOARD SET STEP = STEP + 1 WHERE STEP > (SELECT STEP FROM ANSWERBOARD a WHERE SEQ = #{seq})

INSERT INTO ANSWERBOARD (SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REFER, STEP, DEPTH, DELFLAG, REGDATE) VALUES(ANSWERBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, (SELECT REFER FROM ANSWERBOARD a WHERE SEQ=#{seq}), (SELECT STEP+1 FROM ANSWERBOARD a WHERE SEQ=#{seq}), (SELECT DEPTH+1 FROM ANSWERBOARD a WHERE SEQ=#{seq}),'N',SYSDATE)
